{"id":867409316,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1672304107,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/867409316/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to Roman","memory":"10.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string intToRoman(int num) {\n        unordered_map<int, char> arr;\n        arr[1] = 'I';\n        arr[5] = 'V';\n        arr[10] = 'X';\n        arr[50] = 'L';\n        arr[100] = 'C';\n        arr[500] = 'D';\n        arr[1000] = 'M';\n\n        unordered_map<int, int> grr;\n        grr[0] = 1;\n        grr[1] = 5;\n        grr[2] = 10;\n        grr[3] = 50;\n        grr[4] = 100;\n        grr[5] = 500;\n        grr[6] = 1000;\n\n        int i = 6;\n        int add;\n        string ans = \"\";\n        while(num != 0){\n            if(num >= 9 && num < 10){\n                ans += \"IX\";\n                num = num - 9;\n            }\n            else if(num >= 90 && num < 100){\n                ans += \"XC\";\n                num = num - 90;\n            }\n            else if(num >= 900 && num < 1000){\n                ans += \"CM\";\n                num = num - 900;\n            }\n            else if(num >= 4 && num < 5){\n                ans += \"IV\";\n                num = num - 4;\n            }\n            else if(num >= 40 && num < 50){\n                ans += \"XL\";\n                num = num - 40;\n            }\n            else if(num >= 400 && num < 500){\n                ans += \"CD\";\n                num = num - 400;\n            }\n            else{\n                add = num/grr[i];\n                if(add != 0){\n                    for(int j=0; j<add; j++){\n                        ans += arr[grr[i]];\n                    }\n                }\n                num = num%grr[i];\n            }\n            i--;\n            \n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-roman","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
